GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews:review_id.description: serves the full review matching the review_id parameter

PATCH /api/reviews:review_id.description: serves an updated review with votes increased by the value provided in an 'inc_votes' property on the request body

GET /api/reviews:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments corresponding to the review_id provided

POST /api/reviews:review_id/comments.description: serves a new comment containing the username and body provided in the request body

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment matching the comment_id parameter
